title: Where oranges grow
creator_credit: Jean Richards, Nandor Jenes, ABC-TV (Australia) and Australian Broadcasting Commission
brief_description: Describes the life of a boy living on an orange grove near the Murray River, close to Mildura. Shows orchard activities and outlines the early history of orchards in the area.
creator_credit_for_label: Jean Richards, Nandor Jenes, ABC-TV (Australia) and Australian Broadcasting Commission
description: Describes the life of a boy living on an orange grove near the Murray River, close to Mildura. Shows orchard activities and outlines the early history of orchards in the area.
